frameworks.name: 9Q Framework
frameworks.question: Where should our AI portfolio be positioned?
frameworks.description: A 3×3 strategic positioning grid for AI portfolios, mapping customer autonomy against execution autonomy.

frameworks.name: AAA Maturity Model
frameworks.question: Are we ready? How do we progress?
frameworks.description: Three-tier capability maturity model describing how organizations progress through Assist, Augment, and Adapt stages.

frameworks.name: Lines, Loops & Vibes
frameworks.question: What's the rhythm of our organization?
frameworks.description: Diagnostic framework categorizing organizational work into repeatable structures (Lines), learning cycles (Loops), and intuition-driven work (Vibes).

frameworks.name: The 4A Process
frameworks.question: How does work change with AI?
frameworks.description: Four approaches to work transformation: Abandon, Assist, Augment, Adapt. Starts with elimination before transformation.

unifiedLogic.description: All frameworks share a common foundation. AAA applies internally as capability maturity and externally as the 9Q strategic positioning grid.

connections.relationship: AAA is the vertical axis of 9Q. Internal capability determines viable external positions.
AAA tier unlocks different 4A options. Adapt-level required for Adapt transformation.
